longDescription: For clients seeking instant transformation, Dr. SNA uses premium body-formulated hyaluronic acid fillers to lift hip dips, define the upper pole, and smooth contour irregularities. Unlike implants, volume is sculpted layer by layer and can be refined or dissolved if preferences change.

steps.description: Layered filler placement with immediate feedback.
steps.title: Injection Session
Review
steps.description: Check-in after swelling settles; adjust if needed.

features.title: On-the-spot sculpting
features.description: See curves build in the mirror and tweak as we go.

features.title: Fully reversible
features.description: Hyaluronidase can dissolve filler if preferences change.

features.title: Minimal downtime
features.description: Return to desk work the next day; gym in 7 days.

title: Hyaluronic Acid Buttock Fillers

cta.title: See Your Curves Today
cta.subtitle: Book a dermal filler buttock consultation with Dr. SNA.

overview.title: What to Expect
overview.content: After 3D mapping we inject HA filler using blunt cannulas to avoid vessels. Volume is layered to sculpt upper, mid, and lower poles for symmetry. Because filler is hydrophilic, results remain soft and natural to the touch.

seo.metaTitle: Dermal Filler Buttock Augmentation London | Instant Non-Surgical BBL | Dr. SNA
seo.metaDescription: Achieve fuller curves immediately with high-density hyaluronic acid buttock fillers. Doctor-only injections, custom mapping, adjustable volume.
seo.h1: Dermal Filler Buttock Augmentation in London

description: High-density HA fillers add immediate projection and shape to the buttocks or hips with precise cannula placement.

packages.description: 4 syringes for subtle hip dip correction.
packages.name: Contour Starter

hero.headline: Instant Curves, Tailored to You
hero.subheadline: Premium HA body fillers create projection and shape you see right away.

faq.question: How much filler do I need?
faq.answer: Ranges from 4 to 12 syringes depending on volume goals. We create a plan and can stage sessions.

faq.question: Is it safe?
faq.answer: We use cannulas, aspirate frequently, and keep hyaluronidase on hand for total control.
